biotools.summary: A tool to test next-generation-sequencing (NGS) data from single-cell sequencing for contamination. By using sophisticated dimensionality reduction and clustering methods, it uses tetramer profiles to differentiate between different species in a given sample.

bioschemas.name: acdc
bioschemas.summary: A tool to test next-generation-sequencing (NGS) data from single-cell sequencing for contamination. By using sophisticated dimensionality reduction and clustering methods, it uses tetramer profiles to differentiate between different species in a given sample.
